item.title: Suci add a quote by Tere Liye
item.description: "Wahai, wanita-wanita yang hingga usia tiga puluh, empat puluh, atau lebih dari itu, tapi belum juga menikah (mungkin kerana kekurangan fizikal, tidak ada kesempatan, atau tidak pernah 'terpilih' di dunia yang amat keterlaluan mencintai harta dan penampilan wajah.) Yakinlah, wanita-wanita solehah yang sendiri, namun tetap mengisi hidupnya dengan indah, bersedekah dan berkongsi, berbuat baik dan bersyukur. Kelak di hari akhir sungguh akan menjadi bidadari-bidadari syurga. Dan khabar baik itu pastilah benar, bidadari syurga parasnya cantik luar biasa." -- Tere Liye

item.title: Suci add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Suci add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If pain must come, may it come quickly. Because I have a life to live, and I need to live it in the best way possible. If he has to make a choice, may he make it now. Then I will either wait for him or forget him." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Suci add a quote by Jon Katz
item.description: "I think if I've learned anything about friendship, it's to hang in, stay connected, fight for them, and let them fight for you. Don't walk away, don't be distracted, don't be too busy or tired, don't take them for granted. Friends are part of the glue that holds life and faith together. Powerful stuff." -- Jon Katz

item.title: Suci add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I have great faith in fools - self-confidence my friends will call it." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Suci add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Do not think that love in order to be genuine has to be extraordinary. What we need is to love without getting tired. Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Suci add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Suci add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is like an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Suci add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "None of us knows what might happen even the next minute, yet still we go forward. Because we trust. Because we have Faith." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Suci add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Suci add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Suci add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "You may delay, but time will not." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Suci add a quote by Pope John Paul II
item.description: "The future starts today, not tomorrow." -- Pope John Paul II

item.title: Suci add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "The past is a ghost, the future a dream and all we ever have is now." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Suci add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Suci add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Suci add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Suci add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Suci add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Suci add a quote by Sinta Yudisia
item.description: "tak seterusnya dunia berputar seperti yang kita kehendaki.. manusia sering salah memilih, maka mintalah padaNya yang terbaik (Lafaz Cinta - Sinta Yudisia)" -- Sinta Yudisia
